bibl.title: A Small Hoard of Fourth Century Bronze Coins from Egypt.
bibl.note: Hoard presented by A.E.R. Boak to the Kelsey Museum (University of Michigan, Ann Arbor), purchased in 1932 near Abydos from a peasant. 37 bronze coins, 36 of which were minted between A.D. 320 and 341.
bibl.seg: King C.E., A Small Hoard of Fourth Century Bronze Coins from Egypt.

Hoard presented by A.E.R. Boak to the Kelsey Museum (University of Michigan, Ann Arbor), purchased in 1932 near Abydos from a peasant. 37 bronze coins, 36 of which were minted between A.D. 320 and 341.
